title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added Raycast integration for GitHub Copilot Coding Agent, enabling task creation and tracking from macOS.
Included `threat-models: local` in code scanning configuration for advanced setups.
Renamed "AI-powered issue intake tool" to "AI assessment comment labeler" in issue triaging docs.
Extended issue schema in REST API and webhooks to include `parent_issue_url` for sub-issue relationships.
Updated OpenAPI schema examples and GitHub Apps config SHA.
summary:
- Added Raycast integration for GitHub Copilot Coding Agent, enabling task creation and tracking from macOS.
- Included `threat-models: local` in code scanning configuration for advanced setups.
- Renamed "AI-powered issue intake tool" to "AI assessment comment labeler" in issue triaging docs.
- Extended issue schema in REST API and webhooks to include `parent_issue_url` for sub-issue relationships.
- Updated OpenAPI schema examples and GitHub Apps config SHA.

raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added Raycast integration for GitHub Copilot Coding Agent, enabling task creation and tracking from macOS.
- Included `threat-models: local` in code scanning configuration for advanced setups.
- Renamed "AI-powered issue intake tool" to "AI assessment comment labeler" in issue triaging docs.
- Extended issue schema in REST API and webhooks to include `parent_issue_url` for sub-issue relationships.
- Updated OpenAPI schema examples and GitHub Apps config SHA.

### Title
Add Raycast support for Copilot, code scanning threat models, and issue parent URL
